Class PhysicalMoney

java.lang.Object
com.lucas.ticketsalesmanager.models.paymentMethod.Payment
com.lucas.ticketsalesmanager.models.paymentMethod.PhysicalMoney
public class PhysicalMoney extends Payment
The PhysicalMoney class represents a payment method using physical cash. It extends the Payment class and provides functionality specific to cash transactions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    PhysicalMoney(double amount, Ticket ticket)
    Constructs a new PhysicalMoney payment with the specified amount and ticket.

    • validate

      public boolean validate(String paymentDetails)
      Validates the payment details for the cash payment.
      Specified by:
      validate in class Payment
      Parameters:
      paymentDetails - The details to validate, typically the provided cash amount as a string.
      Returns:
      true if the provided amount is sufficient for the ticket price, false otherwise.

    • executePayment

      public boolean executePayment()
      Executes the cash payment process.
      Specified by:
      executePayment in class Payment
      Returns:
      true if the payment was processed successfully, false otherwise.
